explanation: The stage direction describes the character pulling an object (a demi Cercle) from their pocket and pointing it at another object (a canne). This interaction with an object, specifically the handling of the demi Cercle as well as its declaration as an object of attention, classifies it best under the 'object' category.
stgdir: Il tire de sa poche un demi Cercle, et le braque sur une canne qu'il tient à la main, et qui sert d'appui.
